content: I'm glad you mentioned that. I've been thinking about how I can apply some of the entrepreneurial lessons I've learned from "How I Built This" to my own life. I've been trying to cut down on my social media usage and use that extra time to listen to podcasts or read books. It's been really helpful for my mental health, and I feel more productive during my daily commute. Do you have any podcast recommendations that focus on personal development or productivity?
